manual.title: Manual hub setup
manual.description: Enter the IP address and port of your Sofabaton hub. The default port is 8102.

ports.title: Proxy ports
ports.description: These ports are used by the local proxy that emulates the hub. Most users can keep the defaults. Change them only if there is a conflict. Note that this setting currently applies to all configured hubs. The ports represents a base value, and the integration will try to find an open port within 32 ports of what you enter here.

zeroconf_confirm.title: Discovered Sofabaton hub
zeroconf_confirm.description: Home Assistant found a Sofabaton hub ({{name}} @ {{host}}). Confirm to set it up.
